definition: to receive instruction/to benefit from advice
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Write well, pare chrysalis reel off raw silk from cocoons, expect sequel Write very carefully, suffer taught.
sentences.chinese: 写得不错，剥茧抽丝，期待后续写得很仔细，受教了。

sentences.english: A meek person is someone who has made the healing choice to be teachable.
sentences.chinese: 温柔的人是可以做出有益的选择来使自己受教的人。

sentences.english: Thus we have heard from the wise who taught us this.
sentences.chinese: 如是我闻自所受教之哲人。

sentences.english: The uneducated people was either unable to do it or do it badly.
sentences.chinese: 未受教育的人要么不能做要么做得很差。

sentences.english: He is not so much unintelligent as uneducated.
sentences.chinese: 与其说他不聪明，不如说他未受教育。

sentences.english: It is, indeed, as Obama said Friday, a “teachable moment.”
sentences.chinese: 这的的确确是像奥巴马上周五所说的“受教的时刻”。

sentences.english: It's often ignored under study for action as the students who receive the educator.
sentences.chinese: 作为受教育者的学生，在研究中常常被忽视。

sentences.english: A pauper has as much a right to learn as a king.
sentences.chinese: 穷人和国王一样均有受教的权利。

sentences.english: Mass unemployment among the educated in India may have contradictory implications.
sentences.chinese: 印度受教育者大量失业可能会产生两种相矛盾的后果。

sentences.english: I mistook you for another physician who is receiving instruction here.
sentences.chinese: 我把你错认为来此受教的另一位医生了。

sentences.english: Please keep out hearts receptive and repentant .
sentences.chinese: 求您保守我们常存受教和悔改的心。

sentences.english: So now that I've educated myself, here's the etymology.
sentences.chinese: 因此我受教了，这是它的词源。

sentences.english: Democracy is rejected because it is as such the rule of the uneducated.
sentences.chinese: 民主遭到排斥，因为它是未受教育者的统治。

sentences.english: Ma is studying Zen Buddhism from his Lao Shi (teacher) Gong Qian Cai Rang.
sentences.chinese: 马先生目前正在研究禅宗，受教于恭乔才让大师。

sentences.english: A month ago you were in med school being taught by doctors.
sentences.chinese: 一个月之前，你们还在医学院，受教于医生们。

sentences.english: Girls should not have to work without any education.
sentences.chinese: 女孩如果没受教育，就不应该工作。

definition: to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
I'd like to hear the details
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
lit. I dare not (accept the honor); fig. I don't deserve your praise/you flatter me
